biotools.summary: Simulate interactions among two genetic and one environmental factor and also allows for epistatic interactions. It is based on data with realistic patterns of linkage disequilibrium, and imposes no limitations either on the number of individuals to be simulated or on number of non-predisposing genetic/environmental factors to be considered.

bioschemas.name: GENS
